'''15w47c''' is the forty-third [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.9]], released on November 20, 2015<ref>{{link|url=https://www.mojang.com/2015/11/minecraft-snapshot-15w47a/|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20151120152032/https://www.mojang.com/2015/11/minecraft-snapshot-15w47a/|title=Minecraft snapshot 15w47c|author=Searge|website=Mojang.com|date=Nov 20, 2015}}</ref> to fix some issues with [[15w47b]].

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[Cobweb]]'''
* Now drops when broken with [[shears]]. 
** Silk Touch is no longer required.

== Trivia ==
* 15w47c was previously removed from the [[launcher]] for some time, but was added back in September 2018.
* 15w47c features a glitch with the Ender Dragon respawn code. Because of this, bedrock became obtainable in Survival mode.
